website_summaries.verdict: One of the many Cole Haan sneakers, the Grand Crosscourt II is a versatile tennis-inspired sneaker in a simple yet classy look. It is a great pair to match any outfit for dressing up or down. It is equipped with the Grand-OS technology that provides responsive cushioning that is lightweight, flexible, and breathable. Rubber pods are strategically placed on the heel and forefront to avoid slipping on any surface.
pros: Many customers love the Cole Haan Grand Crosscourt II for its classy and tailored look that is versatile and can be worn for both casual and dressy activities
A lot of users attest to the superb comfort of the shoes that lasts all day
Numerous reviewers say that the sneaker is very lightweight
Some users like that the shoes are easy to clean when stained
A user mentions its one of the good quality leather Cole Haan shoes with its smooth leather that’s easy to maintain
Many wearers claim that the Cole Haan Grand Crosscourt II sneakers have great cushioning
A lot of users say that the shoes fit well and it has a premium in-shoe feel
A few reviewers mention that the pair is very durable and can last for months of everyday wearing
cons: A few reviewers say that the pair creases easily
Some users say that the blue dye of the Navy colorway rubs off and causes stains

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great. I’m a size 12 wide, I tried to see if these D width would work as these are half the price of other grand shoes. These shoes not only were tight but rolled foot up. These did not even come close to fitting in width. If you’re normally a Wide shoe guy, these won’t even come close.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Much tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much much tighter than expected. I've been wearing Cole haans for years and all of a sudden one pair is too long and narrow and now these are shorter and tighter than I expected. Cole haan must have changed their sizing, but I could easily wear a full size larger with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: Give it a minute
customer_reviews.text: When I first put these on my left foot was a little snug. The toebox however wasn't scrunched at all. I was thinking I needed to return but there is some give and they do apparently stretch. Wore them and they got really comfortable and I didn't notice the tightness after an hour. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Grogansgoat

customer_reviews.title: They run snug but look good
customer_reviews.text: These are not your standard Cole Haans which is a bummer. I’m a 10.5 Cole Haan in every pair I’ve ever owned but these are waaaay to tight at the toe box. I love the shows but I’d need to do an 11 or 10.5W which they don’t have. I don’t have a wide foot at all but the style just didn’t work for me and I don’t have a shoe stretcher at home for them. Returning them but if you can order a half size up or the wide if it’s available in your size unless you have a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizes but amazing comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pair because I liked the first pair so much, I wanted a different color. The feel of the second pair is of at least one size smaller than the first, despite ordering the exact same size. Also, the shoe caused an odd blister inside/side of my heal. I have eczema so doubt others would have a similar problem. Now the good...first pair is very comfortable. I have plantar fasciitis and the shoes are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael Samec

customer_reviews.title: Right Shoe too narrow -
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 pairs of Cole Haan shoes and one very similar - all the same size and this is the only one with this issue - simply a defect.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Very Tight fit!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe. Looks good. However, The toe box is extremely tight. I always wear a medium width in a shoe. I should’ve ordered a wide. I’ve had them for two weeks and are still trying to stretch the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and stylish. You can dress them up, or go casual. My only complaint on these shoes is I wish the sole was greyish instead of white.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Paul Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this shoe in size 10.5, which is my usual. After receiving them, I could barely get my foot in the shoe and it was uncomfortably tight. I exchanged them for the next size up, but they were just as narrow. I ultimately returned those and went with the Ecco New Jersey, which fit great.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband because he has loved Cole Haan brand shoes. These are not the same fit as others! The top of the shoe rubs the top of his foot and is very bothersome. He also has a narrow foot and these are even too narrow for his foot. Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: DLMack13

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Cole Haan shoes and 11.5 M consistently fit me well. These shoes are extremely narrow to the point of being unwearable. Length is fine. They’re nice looking and otherwise nice shoes. I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes, tight for my foot
customer_reviews.text: In general, Cole Haan shoes are fitted more narrowly and smaller than other brands. It had been a few years since I had tried on a pair, so I purchased my normal size. Shoe is very attractive, but more narrow and tighter. I have ordered the next size up, and will update this review if that too does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E

customer_reviews.title: good shoe for sub $100 price
customer_reviews.text: at first the leather felt very stiff and rigid. I was worried it wouldn't be comfortable. After the first day it was great! I've been wearing them 5 days a week in car sales and they're holding up pretty well. The toes do seem to scuff and fade a bit more than other shoes I've owned so I'll need to actually put shoe polish on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Width
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who wears a 10 1/2. He has fairly narrow feet and they seemed to be too narrow for his liking. I have them now and agree, they run narrow. I have another pair of Cole Haas’s and they fit great as far as width for him. I have him mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: COULD NOT BE MORE PLEASED.
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of shoes I’ve ever had. I normally have to wear arch supporters. But not with these. Great comfort and support. Will but more. I did have to return to get a half size bigger. All went smooth and wow, I don’t even like to take them off. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes but they are small compared other brands. If you have wide feet a regular size definitely will not work. I reurned this order and went with a similar style offered by another brand.
customer_reviews.author: walt

customer_reviews.title: Cole Hahn shoe is sized smaller than standard US size
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Appears to be comfy. However, size is a size short in length and width is like a B width. Order a size larger both both length and width.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Frailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes but it was a bit tight maybe because it is leather.. i had the same size but fabric so i thought it will be the same but as i said it was a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Indary

customer_reviews.title: Nice but narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like these and got a lot of compliments, but I had to return the normal size 10 and get the 10.5. The half size up did it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Brock

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a 12, with a high instep and wide foot. I was hesitant on these due to other reviews, but I ordered him a 12M and they fit just right. He's worn them a few times and finds them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bets W

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issue only
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight & comfortable shoes. Based on reviews, bought +0.5 size and they fit as expected (my usual size 9US, so I bought 9.5US).
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Izbenko

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke? Extremely rigid and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot better from Cole Haan. I guess the problem was with my expectation. Awful, far from comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: 123AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband who wears a size 10. Got a size 10 regular and they were way too small and tight. They looked great otherwise, sad to return them!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: These run large
customer_reviews.text: I really like the appearance of these shoes. Unfortunately the leather was a little too thin, and it ran larger than I was accustomed to. And in fact these shoes ran very wide.
customer_reviews.author: RenegadeCJ

customer_reviews.title: Select a size up for a better fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 11 and these shoes were really too small. The entire shoe seemed at least a size and a half too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sunfrolicr

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and classy
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like Cole Haan for comfortable dress shoes with great value. If your workplace is too stuffy for these classy gems, find a new job.
customer_reviews.author: RCadi

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: If you think you might have a wide foot or you do have a wide foot, do not get these. They run extremely tight. I’m usually a 9.5 so grabbed a 10 and they still were too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: One shoe seemed to be more narrow than the other. They are already narrow to begin with. They look really nice though if you can smash your feet into them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin J Edwards JR

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable Cole Haan
customer_reviews.text: The sole of this shoe is the best offered by Cole Han in my opinion. These shoes are very supportive and you could walk all day with no pain. I have very sensitive feet and this is one of the best I’ve worn.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: A bit too tight
customer_reviews.text: Runs narrow but otherwise comfortable. Wore twice before I got locked down due to Covid so they may stretch some.
customer_reviews.author: Bo_Sox

customer_reviews.title: Overall good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well built show was just a little tight in the toe box. I'm hoping they will loosen up after i wear them a few times
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fits as Expected in the Normal Size, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Ordered the normal size and they fit just right. Cute modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Denver's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have them in 2 colors and keep replacing them with the same shoe every time I wear one out.
customer_reviews.author: BigBossMan

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow for a Medium width shoe
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe, but the 11.5 medium are way too narrow. I could barely get my feet in the shoe. I have never bought a wide in any shoe. I cannot wear these and they will be returned. I wish they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Husband Love New Dress Shoes So far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoes for my husband. He average 10 miles a day, where he normally wear a dress shoes. He come home with a sore and tired feet every night. So far he's loving the shoes, it provides a professional appearance and comfort he's been needing. We'll definitely look to purchase a brown pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Size deceiving
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn same size for 48 yrs we hv been married. These were way too small
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new shoes. They were exactly what he was looking for....a dressy casual shoe and extremely comfortable. Looks great with khakis and an oxford shirt but comfortable for walking and being in all day long!
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have got compliments on the shoes almost everywhere I wear them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 22 year old son. They are very stylish .. nice work shoes but still young looking .. not old mans work shoes. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Buying things online can be tricky, but this was a pure waste of money. Previous leather shoes bought online fit and were adequate at worst; however, these shoes are nothing but a pure plastic waste of money. These are literally half a step away from doll shoes you would see on your kids stuffed animals..
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and very comfortable. One of the shoestrings showed pretty frayed, probably want last long. But that is easily replaceable. Arrive in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Ribs narrow, but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes but the only width they have is quite narrow. We had to return.
customer_reviews.author: IT'S BY DESIGN

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair but..
customer_reviews.text: These are a little too narrow for my liking and I have narrow feet. The shoe itself is nice.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe with a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of CH shoes and these are probably my favorite. I work 14 hour shifts and I am on my feet a lot. They have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Shafar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great confortable shoe to wear all day when you’re in sales and on your feet for a good 8 to 10 hours
customer_reviews.author: Vman

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase - Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. They are his go-to now. No break in period, felt great immediately. He’s on his feet all day at work and these are perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Niemotka

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit to size. Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I Love Cole Haan but these shoes did NOT fit like all of my other Cole Haan. I wear 10M and these fit like 8s! I had to sell them for $30 less than I paid for them because so refused to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality - Kinda Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Granted, my husband has a slightly wide-ish foot, but he has never needed "wide" shoes. This particular shoe was too narrow through the sides and toes for him. It is beautifully crafted of fine leather and comfortable in the sole, though - just not quite the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Smith

customer_reviews.title: 2019 Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Every time my brother wear his shoes he's eager to show them off. I'm happy that he loves his shoes. I bought them 2019 Christmas gift and to put a smile on his face lets me know that I did something right
customer_reviews.author: Maderitrick Bush

customer_reviews.title: High-quality, casual work shoes - excellent fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second pair. They seem to last me a little over a year with little to no maintenance. Best for dry weather, they soak easily in rain. Extremely comfortable, great for business casual. Laces could be stronger but they're fine overall.
customer_reviews.author: fnbeans

customer_reviews.title: Look sharp! Run bit small and narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this shoe. Dress it up or casual. I have about 5 pairs of Cole Haans, and this is the first time I’ve had to go a half size up. From my experience, I would recommend going a half size to one full size larger. They are also pretty narrow. Still great shoe and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Thad Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color bottom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black leather shoe with a dark bottom for work. I received a shoe with a white bottom. How hard is it to get a color right. Sending them back without trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil Key

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sharp shoe! Way too narrow though. Width was no where close to what other manufacturers sizes are. Really wanted to keep them but simply way too tight so I returned them. PS - I wear standard size D width in every shoe I’ve ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoe, although the size is 1/2 size small. If you wear a 10 then order an 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these shoes. He bought 2 pair and practically lives in them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected, but a beautiful piece of work
customer_reviews.text: Runs almost 1 to 1.5 size smaller then my previous pair of cole haan. I cant even squeeze my foot in. That said, it is a really beautiful and sleek pair of sneakers that would definitely go well with jeans on a dress-down day at work. Its a pity and my loss to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Run Big
customer_reviews.text: Great shows, incredibly comfortable but I am a size 12 and these were at least half a size too big. I had 1.5-2.0 inches in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for lots of walking. Very comfortable. Took these on a 3 week Europe trip and did very well in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: BDA

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The color, the fit, the price, this is a great shoe. Fit as expected and just super comfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee 96

customer_reviews.title: Small fit
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. Get a size bigger if you need this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyedstudio

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: look good and comfortable - go with a lot of outfits
customer_reviews.author: T. Betton

customer_reviews.title: Could have been 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for not giving 5 stars is that they have rubbed blisters on both of my heels. I tried to give them a few wears to get broken it but that has not helped. Other than that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Picture does not do justice to shoes, great quality shoes. Got them on sale at a great price can not be happier with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Armavil4

customer_reviews.title: Tooooo smalllll
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe but way too small if you feet is little wider thank normal don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Carlos S.

customer_reviews.title: Need to offer wide width
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a wide width and this shoe didn’t come in wide. Everything else was good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size not correct. Not a 12 M more a 12 narrow
customer_reviews.text: Size not correct. Not a 12 M more a 12 narrow. Nice shoe other than fit
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Only have it for a week but so far best casual shoes I ever had! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: AMO

customer_reviews.title: For narrow feet only!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Grand Tour Plain Oxford Style in size 13M. Received the Wing Oxford Style. Tried them on prior to returning and they were so narrow that I could not get my foot in the shoe. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Randy H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: In my work I have to be on my feet 8 sometimes 9 hours a day. It can be really tough wearing dress shoes plus I have plantar fasciiitis. I am willing to try everything so I can be on my feet and not worry about the pain. This shoes is very light and soft inside. I was wary at first but it lasted me throughout the day without pain. I actually bought another pair of another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The size is OK 10 1/2 from the length point of view but It seems I need a wider model or size. Left foot is confortanble but the right foot is too tight
customer_reviews.author: Tibi Anca

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Completely love these shoes. So much so that bought multiple pairs. They just look good.
customer_reviews.author: P Silb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably snazzy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, highly comfortable shoe...snazzy fit and these are great with jeans or a suit.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comfortable shoe. I bought 3 pairs and I ware them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made, comfortable and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: product was advertised as truly received; great price , good durability
customer_reviews.author: James M Coumas

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of shoes. I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of shoes. I got on a deal so am happy with the purchase. Cole haan delivers :)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: High quality shoes at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes at a solid price. Look great but not a lot of support.
customer_reviews.author: RockNRoller

customer_reviews.title: a little tight but great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Every day work shoe-fits a little narrow--but happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Joel Vopat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but a little tight
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are very comfortable, but they seem to run narrow across the forefoot
customer_reviews.author: Dr s

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable and classy
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfortable and classy. Feel I could run in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Palazzo

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but does seem to run a half size small and narrow
customer_reviews.author: Todd Moorehead

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my husband. We both love them!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: great look and feel right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: After a recommendation from a friend who said they were his favorite shoe, I decided to give them a try. I have a second pair on order after just the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Bsnead

customer_reviews.title: A little small, but great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Run a little small, suggest getting a half size bigger than your normal fit. Still comfortable and love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Adrian

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are TIGHT, and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Super narrow shoe, make sure you order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: laughing-bear

customer_reviews.title: Tight!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very tight across the foot below the instep. I have several pairs of Cole Haan and have never had this issue. Seems like a design problem.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The shoe that I receive is different from the one on the picture
customer_reviews.text: The shoes run too small. I should off returned them right away but I need it for work so now I’m stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Yohel E.

customer_reviews.title: Not right
customer_reviews.text: Too different size. It narrower than I Expected to be!
customer_reviews.author: francis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great casual shoe. Who can go wrong with Cole Haan? Great deal on this pair. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: But These
customer_reviews.text: The color was spot in and the whole shoe was very sleek looking as I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: small size
customer_reviews.text: I always buy shoes from this brand and always the same size. but these are small, they fit me tight.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for my fotot. Did not care for ...
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow for my fotot. Did not care for the color of the sole/bottom of the shoe, either. This one went back
customer_reviews.author: DAGAZON

customer_reviews.title: Look Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I love the look and they are the comfiest shoe I own. Everyone always looks at them and say nice where can I get a pair.
customer_reviews.author: DD F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband whose hips bother him when he wears shoes without enough support. He loves these.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN FLANDERS

customer_reviews.title: My husband was so surprised!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them! He wants a pair in every color❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Nesbitt-Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and nice looking shoes. I like them so far. I was looking for some travel shoes and these are perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: ruben mbon

customer_reviews.title: Why so small??
customer_reviews.text: Way too small and lower quality material for a cole Haan.
customer_reviews.author: paul kim

customer_reviews.title: The size is way too small, need to go up 2 sizes and go to a wide width
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, but it’s way too small, I have put it in the mail to be returned or exchanged for a larger size!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! My husband loved them
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! My husband loved them, he says they are very comfortable and acurate tothe size.
customer_reviews.author: ES GIRL

customer_reviews.title: In terms of weight it feels like a running shoe rather than a casual or dress ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY Lightweight. In terms of weight it feels like a running shoe rather than a casual or dress shoe. There is a bit of a rise in the left interior of the toe box and the shoe rubbed my pinky toe a little uncomfortably on first wear. I'm a teacher and on my feet for 5-6 hours a day. This shoe wears comfortably throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Edwards

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are almost like wearing my running shoes. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

product_meta.title: Cole Haan Men's Grand Crosscourt Ii Sneaker
product_meta.description: Cole Haan grand tour - the fusion of style and engineering for enhanced comfort for your casual to dress needs. With nearly 80 years in the business and hundreds of points of distribution in the U.S., Cole Haan is one of america's premier luxury brands. Founded in 1928 as a collaboration between trafton Cole and Eddie haan, Cole Haan epitomized artisan quality and impeccable craftsmanship during a time when style was everything. Originally, Cole Haan was a men's footwear label that captured the essence of the 20s spirit with beautifully-designed and well-made shoes for the dapper gentleman. Today, Cole Haan brings that heritage to all of its products, including men's and women's dress and casual footwear, belts, hosiery, handbags, small leather goods, outerwear and sunglasses.
feature_bullets: Classic plain toe pattern on a sport inspired outsole with rich leather or suede uppers.
Textile covered foot bed for comfort and breathability.
Rubber pods in the heel and forefoot for traction.
